Text:
Sorry, but the audio is dreadful...the sync is out by about 2 secs.

Unbearable, unfortunately.
At a glance, the audio looks fine to me.  No sync problem.  Thanks!

Agreed there were no audio sync issues whatsoever.  Use VLC and you'll be fine.  And the reason this is showing as ep10 here and ep08 in wiki is because the wiki doesn't count the 2 "revisted" episodes.  Thanks for this.
